note: -This file is used as a template for the tourmap plugin-. You may additionally define your own category_mapping.json

properties.id: -Sequential Number of IDs for the points in the map-
properties.name: -Define the Title or Name of the point-
properties.text: -Define the Text as description which will be shown in the popup for the map marker-
properties.img: -Link to Image of the tour which will be shown in the popup for the map marker-
